title: Unto his Grace, the Marquess of Tweeddale, his Majesties High Commissioner, and the remanent [sic] honourable estates of Parliament. The petition of the heretors, fewars, liferenters and tennents of the shyres of Inverness, Ross, Cromarty, Elgin, Nairn, Bamff, Aberdeen, Merns, Perth, Fyffe, Angus, Kinross and Stirling, and burghs within the samen.
author: Tweeddale, Charles Hay, Marquis of, 1667-1715.
